title: N'Golo Kante returns to Chelsea training
desc: N’Golo Kante has returned to part training at Cobham after missing Chelsea’s last six matches with a hamstring injury.

title: John Mikel Obi announces retirement
desc: Chelsea legend John Mikel Obi has today officially announced his retirement from football.

title: Mount on his Wembley goal and sticking together
desc: Mason Mount is relishing the opportunity of playing at his first World Cup this winter and believes there were plenty of positives for England to take in last night’s thrilling draw with Germany.
